1.「元ポツコン２号じゃねえですかッ！| いいところに 来ましたッ！| ちょっと こ: Well, if it isn't Ex-Junkey #2! You came|at a great time! Check this out!

2.「こいつは あの遺跡で拾ってきた| 魔神兵とかいうガラクタの 一部なんですがね。: This piece of junk is an old Urbea Aztech.|If I sit down here like this...

3.「イタタタッ！ 見てくだせえッ！| とがった部分が しりっぺたの先に当たって……: YEOUCH! The pointy part stabs you right in|the ass! It hurts something fierce, too!

4.「ここにある たいがいのもんは| イスぐらいには なりますが| こいつは イスに: Most of the junk here is at least good as a|chair, but nobody's gonna wanna sit on|this...

5.「こりゃ正真正銘の ガラクタでごぜえますよッ！| こんな すばらしい物に めぐり: This is a genuine piece of junk! I'm the|happiest Dwarf in all Dwachakka because I|found such a thing!

8.「わわっ！ ダ ダストンさまっ！| こいつ ガラクタのくせに しゃべってますよ！: Whoa! Holy crap, Duston! The junk, it speaks!

9.「エネルギー限界。| 凍眠室 内部 危険。凍眠室 内部 危険……。: Energy depleted. Error detected within|cryosleep chamber. Error detected...

11.「さ さすがの わしでも| 死体は 勘弁でごぜえますよ……？: Eeeyah! Even I don't want a corpse!

14.「……ほほう。ウルベアの魔の手より| 余を救ってくれたのは そちたちじゃな。|: I see. It was you who saved me from the|clutches of Urbea. Don't worry. You will|be rewarded for your service.

15.「い いきなり出てきて エラそうに……。| アンタ いったい 何者でごぜえますか: Just who do you think you are, popping out|of that box with such an attitude?

16.「これは 異なことを……。| ドワーフでありながら 余を知らぬとな？| ……まあ: How is it possible that you are a Dwarf and|yet you do not know me? Hm. It's good for|you that I'm a tolerant man.

17.「ならば 我が名を聞いて おそれおののくのだ！| 余は かのガテリア皇国の 正統: Then, hear my name and tremble! I am Byan Dao|the First Prince, rightful heir to the throne|of Gateria!

19.「あ…あまり反応が ないな。| ……まあ よい。余は 寛大じゃからな。: Ah...not much response. Well, that's fine. I'm|a tolerant man, after all.

20.「おおっ！ そうじゃッ！| こうしては おれん！| 囚われの リウ老師を救わねば: Oh, but I don't have time for this! I must save|Master Liu!

21.「そち！ 奇妙な身なりをしているものの| なかなか ウデが立つと見たぞよ。| 余: You, there! Despite your looks, you have|an aura of... competency about you. I have a|favor to ask of one such as you.

22.「じつはな ウルベア地下帝国には| 余の家庭教師をつとめる リウという男が| 余: Deep within the Underground City of Urbea,|my tutor Master Liu is being held prisoner|just like I was.

23.「そこで 余を ウルベア地下帝国まで導き| リウ老師を救出する 手助けをしてくれ: As much as I dread returning to that place,|I can't possibly leave him behind. If you|accompany me there, you shall be rewarded.

24.「うむ！ 苦しゅうない！| そち 名は なんと申す？| ……そうか <pc>と申: Mmm. Don't worry. Tell me your name.|I see... you are known as <pc>.

25.「それでは <pc>よ！| 反重力飛行装置を 持ってまいれ！| ウルベアまで ひ: Then let us be off! Get your anti-gravity|flight device ready, as Urbea is only|a quick flight away!

27.「……コホン。どうした？| 反重力飛行装置を 知らぬわけではあるまい？| ほれ: From that look on your face, I surmise you|have no idea what I'm talking about. Then I|shall word it differently.

28.「まさか……！| ここには 反重力飛行装置がないと申すか！？<yesno><cl: Is there anything in this place that can be|used to take flight?<yesno><close>

29.「ちょっと 元ポツコン２号さん！| この部屋にあるのは ガラクタだけで| そんな: Ex-Junkey #2, you know all we have here is|junk. Nothing useful or convenient, and|definitely nothing that flies!

30.「言われてみれば 確かに……。| ここにいる者の身なりは 相当 貧相……。| こ: Now that I get a proper look, you're all|dressed so poorly... I see. This must be part|of the slums, then.

31.「すまぬ。余の配慮が 足りなかったわ。| ならば いたしかたなし。| 地下帝国ま: My apologies. I was not paying attention, and|made assumptions about your status. We shall|go on foot to the Underground City.

32.「それでは <pc>よ。| ウルベア地下帝国まで 案内を頼む。| 余は そちの後: Please lead the way to the Urbea Underground|City, <pc>. I will follow right behind you.

33.「ウルベアに着いたら 地下を目指すのじゃ。| 地下３階辺りにある 奥まった部屋に: When you reach the city, head for the basement.|Master Liu should be in a room in the|back of the B3F.

34.「……ムムッ！| そちは 下々の者の依頼を たくさん抱えており| 余の頼みは 受: Mmmh. It seems you're doing too many favors|for the lower classes to accept my request.

35.「……まあ よい。余は 寛大じゃからな。| とはいえ 事態は 一刻を争うのじゃ。: Oh, well. I'm a tolerant man. However, the|situation is time sensitive. Please help me|with the request as soon as possible.

36.「なんと！ 余の頼みを 断ると申すか！| 我がガテリア皇国の威光を| おそれぬ者: How dare you! How could you refuse a request|on behalf of the Kingdom of Gateria?!

37.「……まあ よい。余は 寛大じゃからな。| とはいえ 事態は 一刻を争うのじゃ。: Oh, well. I'm a tolerant man. However, the|time is short. If you change your mind, come|back.

38.「おお 待っておったぞ！| ここにいる者に まともに話せる者はおらぬ。| 頼みの: Oh, I've been waiting for you! No one here has|their head on straight. You're the only one I|can count on.

39.「じつはな ウルベア地下帝国には| 余の家庭教師をつとめる リウという男が| 余: Deep within the Underground City of Urbea,|my tutor Master Liu is being held prisoner|just like I was.

40.「そこで 余を ウルベア地下帝国まで導き| リウ老師を救出する 手助けをしてくれ: As much as I dread returning to that place,|I can't possibly leave him behind. If you|accompany me there, you shall be rewarded.

41.「じつはな ウルベア地下帝国には| 余の家庭教師をつとめる リウという男が| 囚: Deep within the Underground City of Urbea,|my tutor Master Liu is being held prisoner|just like I was.

42.「そちには 余を ウルベア地下帝国まで導き| リウ老師を救出する 手助けをしても: I need you to lead me to the Urbea Underground|City and help me rescue Master Liu.

43.「ウルベアに着いたら 地下を目指すのじゃ。| 地下３階辺りにある 奥まった部屋に: When you reach the city, head for the basement.|Master Liu should be in a room in the|back of the B3F.

44.「反重力飛行装置がないのは| いささか不便じゃが いたしかたなし。| 地下帝国ま: The lack of anti-gravity flight equipment is|somewhat inconvenient, but it is what it is.|Let's go on foot to the underground empire.

45.「それでは <pc>よ。| ウルベア地下帝国まで 案内を頼む。| 余は そちの後: <pc>, please lead the way to the Urbea|Underground Empire. I will follow right|behind you.

46.「ハア ハア……。待ちや <pc>。| いったい どれほど 余を歩かせるのじゃ？: *gasp* *gasp*|<pc>, please... hold up. I'm afraid I can't...|walk a step further without a break...

47.「ところで <pc>よ。| そちは 来る場所を まちがえておらぬか？: And... I think you've led me to the wrong place...

48.「進めども 進めども ガレキの山……。| 余の知っておる ウルベア地下帝国は|: Nothing but rubble, no matter where I look...|Covered in dust, forgotten by time. This...|This can't be Urbea.

49.「深く 広く 掘られた空洞には| 虹色に輝く宝石で 装飾された家屋が並び| 頭上:
Where are the canyons, dredged by dwarven|machines? The ornately decorated houses,|covered in jewels? And, I haven't even|
|seen a single flight device...

50.「のう <pc>よ。| ここが その大陸随一の大国と うたわれた| ウルベア地下: <pc>, do you truly mean to tell me that this|sorry heap is Urbea, the greatest power on|the entire continent of Dwachakka?!<yesno><close>

51.「ならば なぜ かような場所に| 余を 連れてきた！| 連れてきたには それなり: Then why did you bring me to such a place! You|must have had a good reason for bringing me here!

52.「これは異なことを……。余は 信じられぬ。| あの 栄華を誇った地下帝国が| な: I cannot believe it. Why does that glorious|underground empire look like this?

53.<pc>は ビャン・ダオに|この場所が ウルベア地下帝国の|遺跡であることを伝え: <pc> explained to Byan Dao that this|place was the site of the Urbea Underground Ruins.

54.「なん…じゃと……！？| ここは ウルベア地下帝国の遺跡じゃと？| 遺跡というこ: Ruins? Did I hear you correctly? This place|is the Urbea Underground Ruins?! Then, what|you're telling me is...

56.「なんということじゃ……。| 余は…… 余は かの帝国が滅びるまで| 魔神兵の中: Then I must have slumbered within that Aztech|as the empire perished...

57.「な ならば ガテリアは どうじゃ！？| <pc>よ！ そちは ガテリア皇国の|: Then, tell me of Gateria. Do you know what|fate awaited the Kingdom of Gateria?<yesno><close>

58.「おおっ！ 知っておると申すか！| ならば 余に 話してみい！| ガテリアは 今: Oh! You recognize that name? Then tell me,|tell me about what Gateria is like now!

59.「…………………………。| 何も 答えられぬではないか。| クチから出まかせを: ...Don't lie to me! Not about this!

60.「……そうか。何も 知らぬのじゃな。| すなわち ガテリアも ウルベア同様| も: You don't know, then. But I understand.|Gateria, like Urbea, no longer exists.

61.「父上も 母上も もう……。| そんな…… そんな…………。: Then my father and mother are... they're... gone...

62.「……すまぬ。一国の皇子である 余が| 情けない姿を さらしてしもうた……。|: I am sorry. I, a prince, have acted in a way|unfitting of royalty. Please forgive me.

63.「だが そちの話を聞いて| あらゆることに 合点がいったわ。: After listening to you, everything makes sense now.

64.「下々の者が ガテリアの威光に ひれふさぬのも| 反重力飛行装置を 目にしないの: None of the low-class citizens have bowed to|me. I haven't seen a single flight device,|and everyone dresses so strangely...

65.「すべて 時の流れの中で| 我らの文明が 失われてしまったため……。: All because in the course of time, our|great civilization was lost...

66.「……つまりは グルヤンラシュ！| きゃつの思い通りになったということか……！: Guryan Rush! You got what you wanted, you|bastard!

67.「……<pc> そちに聞かせたい話がある。| 余が この時代に来る前の話じゃ……: ...<pc>, I have a story to tell you. A|story from before I came to this time...

68.「かつて この大陸には ふたつの大国があった。| 余が 国王となるはずだった ガ:
There were once two great nations on this|continent. The Kingdom of Gateria, of which I|was to be king. And this Urbea|
|Underground Empire.

69.「ふたつの国は 他の種族を圧倒する技術力を有し| そこに住まう者たちは なに不自: The two countries had technology that|surpassed that of the other races, and their|inhabitants lived in peace and tranquility.

70.「あの乱世の使者 奸臣グルヤンラシュが| ウルベア地下帝国に 現れるまでは……！: Until the emissary of bloodshed, the wicked|Guryan Rush, showed up in the Urbea|Underground City...!

71.「グルヤンラシュは 高潔な神官の身なりで現れ| ウルベア皇帝に取り入ると| ふた:
Guryan Rush appeared in the guise of a|virtuous priest and won the trust of the|Emperor of Urbea, manipulating the two|
|countries into war.

72.「その戦いの中 多くの技術者が散り| たがいの技術と技術が ぶつかり合って| 我:
In the course of that war, many of our great|minds were lost, and as technology collided|with technology, civilization fell into|
|decay...

73.「……そう！ 我らの文明の喪失は| すべて グルヤンラシュの奸計によるもの！|: The loss of our civilization was all due to|the wiles of Guryan Rush. His terrible|schemes brought both countries down!

74.「……そして 行き過ぎた 戦いの果てに| 余は 命の危険に さらされた。| それ: That terrible war put me in mortal peril. But|Master Liu saved me.

75.「父上も母上も もう生きては いまい。| じゃが リウ老師だけは| 今も どこか: My parents are long gone, this I know. But I|believe Master Liu still lives.

76.「老師は 余が この時代に来る前に| 余の後を追って 魔神兵に乗ると| 約束して: He promised that he would climb into one of|those Urbea Aztechs and follow right behind|me.

77.「じゃが ここに老師は いない様子……。| 余は ひとまず あのガラクタ屋敷に戻: But since he doesn't seem to be here, I shall|return to that ramshackle house for now and|think about what to do next.

78.「<pc>よ これは ほうびじゃ。| この時代に価値があるかは わからぬが| あ: This is a reward for you, <pc>. I|don't know if it's worth anything in this day|and age, but accept it gratefully.

79.「<pc>……。| そちは 信頼に値する者だと わかった。| 余が 困ったときは: I have found you to be one worthy of my trust.|If I am ever in trouble, please lend me your|hand again.

80.「リウ老師……。| そなたは どこへ行ったのだ？| 余を 時の激流に 押しやった: Master Liu... where did you go? You left me|behind in the ravages of time...
